help-file.title: "SHADOW TRAVEL"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <player> <mob> Aggressive: No Cumulative: N/A Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Teleportation
"Shadow Travel" is a more powerful version of the "teleport" spell. It transforms the caster and allows them to instantly travel using shadows to any player or mob within a distance-specific area, distance is dependant on the proficiency of the caster.
